# name

**Instance Property**

Returns one of the hostnames of the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: String? { get }
```

## Return Value

One of the hostnames of the receiver. Can be either a simple hostname, such as `"sales"`, or a fully qualified domain name, such as `"sales.anycorp.com"`.

## Getting Host Information

- **address**: Returns one of the network addresses of the receiver.
- **addresses**: Returns all the network addresses of the receiver.
- **localizedName**: Returns the name used as by default when publishing `NSNetServices`.
- **names**: Returns all the hostnames of the receiver.
